message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which I believe holds immense value for you, is now available for purchase. Given its unique features and benefits, it is worth $1,000,000 to you. However, considering its overall quality and market value, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a price that offers significant savings compared to its true market value. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of making this transaction a reality.
